column2: Show all goverment cheat options, These cheats are focused of ideology and goverment parties.
Discover and unlock the Anchro-Liberal ideology. This would normaly take place around 1848.
Discover and unlock the Socialist ideology. This would normaly take place around 1860.
Discover and unlock the Communist ideology. This would normaly take place around 1870.
Discover and unlock the Fascist ideology. This would normaly take place around 1905.
Fires the event which converts your nation to a Constitutional Monarchy.
Converts your nation into a Communist state. Does not change your populations/goverments political ideology.
Converts your nation into a Fascist State. Does not change your populations/goverments political ideology.
Converts your nation into a Presidential Dictatorship. Does not change your populations/goverments political ideology.
Converts your nation into a Democracy. Does not change your populations/goverments political ideology.
